comments.body: Quote from: HedgeFx on February 22, 2023, 10:59:05 AMRepaid + fee for extension 0x98174c8720b0cd0ed43e9c2ec36a2bc644385404d866936ce360dfd59012df75I am confirming that I have received full repayment as well as an extension fee. The payment was received via erc20 instead of trc20 as the OP faced the issue on the hardware wallet also extension happened for that which has been informed via private message. Please don't hesitate to let me know if you need any more help at any time, thank you.
